…In fact, studies suggest that higher cow's  milk-fat intake is associated with a lower risk of childhood obesity.  While it is important to limit fatty, sugary, and highly processed  foods, whole milk does not fit into this category. In fact, many  schoolchildren are at risk of dairy underconsumption, not  overconsumption.
